unnormalised: Athlete biographies are crucial for understanding sports history. Dr. Sharma's biography on Milkha Singh provided invaluable insights. I wish there were more biographies covering athletes from smaller towns like Meerut. A detailed account of Dhyan Chand's training regime, like the area covered in his practice ground (approx. 1000 sq ft), and his early salary (Rs. 50/month) would be fascinating. We need more such comprehensive works in the sports literature!
